ddf.security.realm.sts

Class AbstractStsRealm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.shiro.realm.CachingRealm
      • org.apache.shiro.realm.AuthenticatingRealm
        • ddf.security.realm.sts.AbstractStsRealm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    STSClientConfiguration, org.apache.shiro.authc.LogoutAware, org.apache.shiro.cache.CacheManagerAware, org.apache.shiro.realm.Realm, org.apache.shiro.util.Initializable, org.apache.shiro.util.Nameable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StsRealm, WssStsRealm

    public abstract class AbstractStsRealm
extends org.apache.shiro.realm.AuthenticatingRealm
implements STSClientConfiguration
